mapper.insert: insert into product_aftersale_apply (id, sub_time, sub_by, order_detail_id, sub_type, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, conduct_by, conduct_result, conduct_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conductBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conductResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conductTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update product_aftersale_apply set sub_time = #{subTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sub_by = #{subBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_type = #{subType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conduct_by = #{conductBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conduct_result = #{conductResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conduct_time = #{conductTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, sub_time, sub_by, order_detail_id, sub_type, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, conduct_by, conduct_result, conduct_time from product_aftersale_apply where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, sub_time, sub_by, order_detail_id, sub_type, status, description, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, conduct_by, conduct_result, conduct_time from product_aftersale_apply

SELECT pa.id AS id, pa.sub_time AS subTime, pa.sub_by AS subBy, pa.order_detail_id AS orderDetailId, pa.sub_type AS subType, pa.status AS status, pa.description AS description, pa.conduct_by as conductBy, pa.conduct_result as conductResult, pa.conduct_time as conductTime, ps.sku_id as skuId, od.quantity as quantity, od.price as price, ps.sku_name as skuName, ps.attributes as attributes, ord.order_no as orderNo, pp.pic_small AS picSmall, pp.pic_big AS picBig FROM product_aftersale_apply pa LEFT JOIN order_detail od on pa.order_detail_id = od.odi_id LEFT JOIN product_sku ps on ps.sku_id = od.sku_id LEFT JOIN order_list ord on ord.order_id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN product_pic pp on ps.product_pic_id = pp.product_pic_id WHERE pa.sub_by = #{customerId} ORDER BY pa.sub_time DESC
limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(0) FROM product_aftersale_apply WHERE 1 = 1
and status = #{status}
and sub_time > concat(#{startDate}, ' 0:0:0')
and sub_time < concat(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')
